mappings.comment: check test snapshot or result have been added into github desc
check if the data in e2e/*.csv is simple and complete. (No duplicated data but cover all type of data)
RAW_TABLE use correct in extractor and convertor
check if all primary and foreign id use `IdGen.Generate`
check if http status code (`errors.HttpStatus`) correct
check if primary key in model not duplicated and check if migration added when primary key changed
check if `PageSize` set but not used
check if collector is incremental when `Incremental` is true
